Engineered for Security & Speed

A complete review pipeline that respects your data sovereignty while leveraging the power of modern LLMs.

Zero-Egress Analysis

Run SonarQube and custom linters on your local infrastructure. Only metadata traverses the gateway.

Tunnel-Optimized

Securely expose local AI services to GitHub's cloud via encrypted Cloudflare tunnels without opening firewall ports.

Context-Aware Reviews

AI agents analyze complete file context across the repository to suggest accurate, compilable fixes.

Secret Sanitization

Automatic detection and scrubbing of API keys and credentials before any analysis occurs.

Universal Gateway

One endpoint to rule them all. Route traffic from VS Code, GitHub, and CI/CD through a single validated control plane.

Local-First IDE

VS Code extensions connect directly to your local Docker containers for zero-latency feedback loops.
